item.description:
Specific Topic: EMI - Eye Movement Integration.

This is a specific technique of applying eye movements to help decrease and rid someone of negative emotions/thoughts/or behaviors.

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

 

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - Eye Movement Integration - EMI
